ygData.subject: Give the guy a break
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I know I ve only been on this list for about a month now and don t really know about the arguments that are going on with this list.  Personally I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I know I've only been on this list for about a month now and don't really
know about the arguments that are going on with this list. Personally I
don't care either the man gave us a clue that has started everyone
searching. What else were you guys doing? Nothing but searching, at least
now you have a clue to go along with it. And whoever keeps telling the
troll that he has seen numerous messages from him that have amounted to
nothing, well the past three that I have seen from you contain absolutley
nothing to do with tinkering either. My advice is let's just tinker and
keep the personal shit out of this damn list because I am sick and tired of
reading stupid e-mails that try to degrade someone that is trying to help
us. To the troll if they keep giving you garbage get off this list but
first get the e-mails of all the people that are behind you and just send
them the information. That way you'll weed out all the nonsense that is
going on here.

Marcoux
